translations: （英，非正式）了不起的，极好的；粉碎性的，猛烈的

phrs.translation: n. 非常流行的东西；轰动的演出

sentences.sentence: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentences.translation: 她通过砸烂前男友的家来报复他。

sentences.sentence: Gastroliths make food easier to digest, essentially smashing food up, just as we do when we chew.
sentences.translation: 胃石使食物更容易消化，本质上就是粉碎食物，就像我们通过咀嚼来粉碎食物一样。

sentences.sentence: Believe me, we hobgoblins did our share of mischief—unhinging gates, smashing pumpkins, soaping the library windows with cartoon demons.
sentences.translation: 相信我，我们妖怪也有恶作剧的份儿——把门拉开，把南瓜砸碎，用肥皂在图书馆窗玻璃上画卡通魔鬼。
